topic.title: ZeroBlog: FOMO
topic.body:
INFO: Torrent client, browsers, trackerlist, ipfilter, search engine, dht, streaming audio/video, 0sites...

16_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body:
> [stroopwafel](#comment_2_13YAyCDYoiUAM2ogemrSJ8yEVDNvnEceWp): Also, it needs more categories like "books, audiobooks, sports" etc. And it would also be helpful if you could downvote torrents. That way people can tell others that it is dead or something harmful.

+1 :)

2_193GRQHrQgpudYtUXtPkUp7z6DdYWkLfJX.body:
> [juansantiago](#comment_1_1QFcL2PapA8NuvNWeHCafHaMPJcXgmb55i): ¿de que sirve esto si no ponemos nuestros perfiles, blogs, etc? :)En zerome: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i/1QFcL2PapA8NuvNWeHCafHaMPJcXgmb55i/juansantiago@zeroid.bitBlog: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EsymyEW97pFPJPQLqQairLdcDcVTxqKPR/

te dejo este par de enlaces a la WIKIES, puedes editarla, solo ten cuidado de no destrozar el trabajo XD: el primero es una **lista de usuarios en la WIKI**; el segundo es **una lista de blogs hispanos** pensado para q todo el q acuda a la WIKI tenga esa info. suerte!
[WIKIES_Lista de usuarios](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FwbupJhHcnFWGXuu3bn5VxcRVW9tx2tDQ/?Page:lista-usuarios-comunidad)
[WIKIES_Lista de blogs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FwbupJhHcnFWGXuu3bn5VxcRVW9tx2tDQ/?Page:lista-blogs-espanol)

1_16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY.body:

+ need a search and categories
+ private icon works?

1_1KnEtYMVmKoVwxDkGUrmeZs4rbc6LWB1fQ.body:

thanks! :)

2_1KnEtYMVmKoVwxDkGUrmeZs4rbc6LWB1fQ.body:
> [zeronetuser6](#comment_5_1KnEtYMVmKoVwxDkGUrmeZs4rbc6LWB1fQ): It should be working now

confirmed! works

suggestion:
+ more information about the file to upload: details, upload progress...
+ successful upload, failed upload?
+ generated link uploaded file
+ storage_info?

5_1F2PXhSgvJJvhpJzVmE2eEpgoUbDt4k1gk.body: como una segunda opción a zerotalkES, sin limites de post para el usuario. gracias
